objects.description: [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has stolen data from the clipboard using the Python project “pyperclip”.(Citation: Esentire ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023) [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has also captured clipboard contents during copy and paste operations.(Citation: Zscaler ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)
